ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for a NutritionOrder resource.

NutritionOrder.Name: NutritionOrder
NutritionOrder.Description: An instance of the R4 NutritionOrder resource.

dateTime.Name: dateTime
dateTime.Description: The date and time of the order.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description:
The current intention for an order. Supported values include:

  • order
  • plan
  • proposal

oralDiet.Name: oralDiet
oralDiet.Description: The details of a diet order.

modifier.Name: modifier
modifier.Description: Describes the texture of food as part of a diet.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient whom the nutrition orders are related to.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The status of a nutrition order. Supported value include:

  • draft
  • active
  • completed
  • revoked
  • unknown
  • entered-in-error
